36 
37 IMUPreintegrator::IMUPreintegrator()
38 {
39  // delta measurements, position/velocity/rotation(matrix)
40  _delta_P.setZero(); // P_k+1 = P_k + V_k*dt + R_k*a_k*dt*dt/2
41  _delta_V.setZero(); // V_k+1 = V_k + R_k*a_k*dt
42  _delta_R.setIdentity(); // R_k+1 = R_k*exp(w_k*dt). note: Rwc, Rwc'=Rwc*[w_body]x
43 
44  // jacobian of delta measurements w.r.t bias of gyro/acc
45  _J_P_Biasg.setZero(); // position / gyro
46  _J_P_Biasa.setZero(); // position / acc
47  _J_V_Biasg.setZero(); // velocity / gyro
48  _J_V_Biasa.setZero(); // velocity / acc
49  _J_R_Biasg.setZero(); // rotation / gyro
50 
51  // noise covariance propagation of delta measurements
52  _cov_P_V_Phi.setZero();
53 
54  _delta_time = 0;
55 }
56 
57 void IMUPreintegrator::reset()
58 {
59  // delta measurements, position/velocity/rotation(matrix)
60  _delta_P.setZero(); // P_k+1 = P_k + V_k*dt + R_k*a_k*dt*dt/2
61  _delta_V.setZero(); // V_k+1 = V_k + R_k*a_k*dt
62  _delta_R.setIdentity(); // R_k+1 = R_k*exp(w_k*dt). note: Rwc, Rwc'=Rwc*[w_body]x
63 
64  // jacobian of delta measurements w.r.t bias of gyro/acc
65  _J_P_Biasg.setZero(); // position / gyro
66  _J_P_Biasa.setZero(); // position / acc
67  _J_V_Biasg.setZero(); // velocity / gyro
68  _J_V_Biasa.setZero(); // velocity / acc
69  _J_R_Biasg.setZero(); // rotation / gyro
70 
71  // noise covariance propagation of delta measurements
72  _cov_P_V_Phi.setZero();
73 
74  _delta_time = 0;
75 
76 }
77 
78 // incrementally update 1)delta measurements, 2)jacobians, 3)covariance matrix
79 // acc: acc_measurement - bias_a, last measurement!! not current measurement
80 // omega: gyro_measurement - bias_g, last measurement!! not current measurement
81 void IMUPreintegrator::update(const Vector3d& omega, const Vector3d& acc, const double& dt)
82 {
83  double dt2 = dt*dt;
84 
85  Matrix3d dR = Expmap(omega*dt);
86  Matrix3d Jr = JacobianR(omega*dt);
87 
88  // noise covariance propagation of delta measurements
89  // err_k+1 = A*err_k + B*err_gyro + C*err_acc
90  Matrix3d I3x3 = Matrix3d::Identity();
91  Matrix<double,9,9> A = Matrix<double,9,9>::Identity();
92  A.block<3,3>(6,6) = dR.transpose();
93  A.block<3,3>(3,6) = -_delta_R*skew(acc)*dt;
94  A.block<3,3>(0,6) = -0.5*_delta_R*skew(acc)*dt2;
95  A.block<3,3>(0,3) = I3x3*dt;
96  Matrix<double,9,3> Bg = Matrix<double,9,3>::Zero();
97  Bg.block<3,3>(6,0) = Jr*dt;
98  Matrix<double,9,3> Ca = Matrix<double,9,3>::Zero();
99  Ca.block<3,3>(3,0) = _delta_R*dt;
100  Ca.block<3,3>(0,0) = 0.5*_delta_R*dt2;
101  _cov_P_V_Phi = A*_cov_P_V_Phi*A.transpose() +
102  Bg*IMUData::getGyrMeasCov()*Bg.transpose() +
103  Ca*IMUData::getAccMeasCov()*Ca.transpose();
104 
105 
106  // jacobian of delta measurements w.r.t bias of gyro/acc
107  // update P first, then V, then R
108  _J_P_Biasa += _J_V_Biasa*dt - 0.5*_delta_R*dt2;
109  _J_P_Biasg += _J_V_Biasg*dt - 0.5*_delta_R*skew(acc)*_J_R_Biasg*dt2;
110  _J_V_Biasa += -_delta_R*dt;
111  _J_V_Biasg += -_delta_R*skew(acc)*_J_R_Biasg*dt;
112  _J_R_Biasg = dR.transpose()*_J_R_Biasg - Jr*dt;
113 
114  // delta measurements, position/velocity/rotation(matrix)
115  // update P first, then V, then R. because P's update need V&R's previous state
116  _delta_P += _delta_V*dt + 0.5*_delta_R*acc*dt2; // P_k+1 = P_k + V_k*dt + R_k*a_k*dt*dt/2
117  _delta_V += _delta_R*acc*dt;
118  _delta_R = normalizeRotationM(_delta_R*dR); // normalize rotation, in case of numerical error accumulation
119 
120 
121 // // noise covariance propagation of delta measurements
122 // // err_k+1 = A*err_k + B*err_gyro + C*err_acc
123 // Matrix3d I3x3 = Matrix3d::Identity();
124 // MatrixXd A = MatrixXd::Identity(9,9);
125 // A.block<3,3>(6,6) = dR.transpose();
126 // A.block<3,3>(3,6) = -_delta_R*skew(acc)*dt;
127 // A.block<3,3>(0,6) = -0.5*_delta_R*skew(acc)*dt2;
128 // A.block<3,3>(0,3) = I3x3*dt;
129 // MatrixXd Bg = MatrixXd::Zero(9,3);
130 // Bg.block<3,3>(6,0) = Jr*dt;
131 // MatrixXd Ca = MatrixXd::Zero(9,3);
132 // Ca.block<3,3>(3,0) = _delta_R*dt;
133 // Ca.block<3,3>(0,0) = 0.5*_delta_R*dt2;
134 // _cov_P_V_Phi = A*_cov_P_V_Phi*A.transpose() +
135 // Bg*IMUData::getGyrMeasCov*Bg.transpose() +
136 // Ca*IMUData::getAccMeasCov()*Ca.transpose();
137 
138  // delta time
139  _delta_time += dt;
140 
141 }
142

Matrix3d skew(const Vector3d &v)
